name: Navy and Green Ikat with Grey Canvas Messenger Bag
description:
This medium sized messenger bag is the perfect size! It has 2 very roomy pockets - one on the outside under the flap and another on the inside of the bag. It has a great extra wide adjustable strap and a trendy swivel clasp closure on the flap.

I used a trendy ikat print in shades of green, navy blue and white for the flap and paired it with a light grey cotton canvas for the body and the strap. The flap closure is made from a coordinating herringbone patterned cotton, also in green and navy and there is an o-ring/swivel clasp closure.

The lining of the bag is also in the herringbone pattern used for the outside closure's strap and the large slip is made with the ikat print. The lining of the outside slip pocket is in the ikat print.

Measurements are:

Width:11.5 inches (29.21 cm)
Height: 10 inches (25.4 cm)
Depth: 3 inches (7.62 cm)
Strap adjustable from: 28.5 inches (72.39 cm) to 49.5 inches (125.73 cm)

*** Photo #5 shows a similar bag for size reference.

*** made from a pattern by michellepatterns.com

name: Turquoise Ikat Canvas Pleated Shoulder Bag
description:
The exterior fabric is in a beautiful ikat print in a turquoise blue pattern on a beige background. Both sides are identical except that there are 3 fabric covered buttons on the front. I used a beige canvas fabric to create the double straps as well as an accent strip between the top band and the pleated bottom.

This bag is perfect for those who want a zippered closure on their bags. I used a matching beige zipper with an adorable bead zipper pull in a coordinating turquoise blue. The lining fabric is an ivory cotton/linen blend and I've sewn in 3 slip pockets in the same fabric as the exterior and 1 zippered pocket in the ivory linen fabric.

Measurements for this bag are:

Width at widest: 16 inches (40.64 cm)
Height: 11 inches (27.94 cm)
Depth: 4 inches (10.16 cm)
Strap length: 23.25 inches (59.06 cm) with an 11 inch (27.94 cm) drop

If you like this bag but would prefer different fabrics, please feel free to contact me for a custom bag. :)

name: Orange and Brown Oval Canvas Zippered Shoulder Bag
description:
Get started on your fall wardrobe with this beautiful shoulder bag! I love the colour palette: orange and brown with a hint of white. This is a larger sized bag in a home decor cotton canvas. Both sides are identical except that there are 3 fabric covered buttons on the front. I used a brown canvas fabric to create the double straps as well as an accent strip between the top band and the pleated bottom.

This bag is perfect for those who want a zippered closure on their bags. I used a matching brown zipper with an adorable bead zipper pull. The lining fabric is an ivory cotton/linen blend and I've sewn in 3 slip pockets and 1 zippered pocket in the same fabric as the exterior.

Measurements for this bag are:

Width at widest: 16 inches (40.64 cm)
Height: 11 inches (27.94 cm)
Depth: 4 inches (10.16 cm)
Strap length: 23.25 inches (59.06 cm) with an 11 inch (27.94 cm) drop

If you like this bag but would prefer different fabrics, please feel free to contact me for a custom bag. :)

name: Black Yarn Dyed Linen with Red, Grey, Black Zig Zag Zippered Shoulder Bag
description:
Start the Fall season with a stylish, modern look with this bag! It has a trendy zig zag pattern in black, greys, red and white for the top band and a yarn dyed linen in black that has a great texture. Both sides of the bag are identical and I used the linen for the double straps as well as the body of the bag.

This bag is perfect for those who want a zippered closure on their bags. I used a matching black zipper with an adorable bead zipper pull in a coordinating marbled black. The lining fabric is a grey slub cotton fabric and I've sewn in 3 slip pockets and 1 zippered pocket in the zig zag fabric.

Measurements for this bag are:

Width at widest: 16 inches (40.64 cm)
Height: 11 inches (27.94 cm)
Depth: 4 inches (10.16 cm)
Strap length: 21.25 inches (53.98 cm) with a 10 inch (25.4 cm) drop

If you like this bag but would prefer different fabrics, please feel free to contact me for a custom bag. :)

name: Blue Diamond Jacquard and Embroidered Ribbon Zippered Hobo Bag
description:
This beautiful hobo bag is a great, larger size - perfect for carrying essentials as an overnight bag. It would also make a great everyday purse for someone who likes to carry quite a few belongings.

This large hobo bag is both unique and practical. I used a beautiful blue jacquard upholstery weight fabric for the outside that has a great thick texture with a diamond pattern. I then added an embroidered cotton ribbon on both sides of the bag. The short shoulder strap is in a real cowhide suede leather and it is attached to the O-rings with nickel rivets.

For the lining of the bag, I used a solid ivory cotton/linen blend fabric for the main lining. There are 3 slip pockets and 1 zippered pocket inside the bag in a pink and blue floral fabric by Joel Dewberry. The bag closes with a tan nickel YKK zipper and I added 2 small zipper pulls made from small glass beads on a silver swivel clasp.

Along the bottom of the bag are 8 pleats that give the bag its depth.

I've interfaced this bag with a combination of duck canvas and fusible interfacing. It is quite thick and sturdy and will stand on its own when empty.

Measurements for this bag are:
Width at widest point: 18 inches (45.72 cm)
Height: 10 inches (25.4 cm)
Depth: 5 inches (12.7 cm)
Strap Length: 21.5 inches (54.61 cm) with an 11 inch (27.94 cm) drop

*** The zippered hobo is made from a NapKitten Pattern

name: Gothic Rose with Green Corduroy Zippered Hobo Bag
description:
This one of a kind bag features a beautiful Amy Butler fabric called Gothic Rose in Burgundy for the top and the bottom is in a green home decor weight corduroy making this bag both pretty and sturdy. Both sides of the bag features these fabrics.

For the lining of the bag, I used a coordinating Amy Butler striped fabric. There are 3 slip pockets and 1 zippered pocket inside the bag. The bag closes with a black nickel YKK zipper and I added 2 small zipper pulls made from small glass beads on a silver swivel clasp.

Along the bottom of the bag are 8 pleats that give the bag its depth.

I've interfaced this bag with a combination of duck canvas and fusible interfacing.

This beautiful hobo bag is a great, larger size - perfect for carrying essentials as an overnight bag. It would also make a great everyday purse for someone who likes to carry quite a few belongings.

Measurements for this bag are:
Width at widest point: 17 inches (43.18 cm)
Height: 10 inches (25.4 cm)
Depth: 5 inches (12.7 cm)
Strap Length: 20.5 inches (52.07 cm) with a 13 inch (33.02 cm) drop

*** The zippered hobo is made from a NapKitten Pattern

name: Summer Totem Velveteen Hobo Bag
description:
This beautiful hobo bag is a great, larger size - perfect for carrying essentials as an overnight bag. It would also make a great everyday purse for someone who likes to carry quite a few belongings.

For this extra large hobo bag, I used a soft cotton velveteen home decor fabric by Anna Maria Horner. It features a beautiful floral print in shades of pink, orange, yellow and blue on a medium brown background.The short shoulder strap is in brown canvas for the top of the strap and the same velveteen on the underside of the strap.

For the lining of the bag, I used a solid orange cotton fabric for the main lining. There are 3 slip pockets in the velveteen fabric and 1 zippered pocket inside the bag in the orange cotton fabric. The bag closes with a brown nickel YKK zipper and I added 2 small zipper pulls made from small glass beads on a silver clasp.

Along the bottom of the bag are 8 pleats that give the bag its depth.

I've interfaced this bag with a combination of duck canvas and fusible interfacing. It is quite thick and sturdy and will stand on its own when empty.

Measurements for this bag are:
Width at widest point: 18 inches (45.72 cm)
Height: 10 inches (25.4 cm)
Depth: 5 inches (12.7 cm)
Strap Length: 21 inches (53.34 cm) with an 11 inch (27.94 cm) drop

*** The zippered hobo is made from a NapKitten Pattern

name: Yarn Dyed Linen in Black with Black and White Floral Messenger Bag
description:
This messenger bag is made from a beautiful yarn dyed linen in black which I've paired with another linen fabric in a black and white floral sketch pattern for the flap. I've also used the floral fabric for the inside pockets and the lining of the outside pocket under the flap.

The lining of the bag is in a solid black cotton fabric and there is one large slip pocket and one zippered pocket inside the bag for a total of 3 pockets. I've used a cotton duck canvas to interface the bag, making it slightly sturdier and more durable.

The strap is 1.5 inches thick and I made it adjustable so you can wear the bag cross body if you prefer.

This medium sized messenger bag is the perfect size! It has 2 very roomy pockets - one on the outside under the flap and another on the inside of the bag. It has a great extra wide adjustable strap and a trendy swivel clasp closure on the flap.

Measurements are:

Width:11.5 inches (29.21 cm)
Height: 10 inches (25.4 cm)
Depth: 3 inches (7.62 cm)
Strap adjustable from: 25.5 inches (64.77 cm) to 44 inches (111.76 cm)

*** made from a pattern by michellepatterns.com

name: Bright Blue Canvas Messenger Bag with Jacquard ribbon trim
description:
This bag is made from a cotton duck canvas in a very bright blue. On the flap, I've sewn 2 strips of a beautiful floral jacquard ribbon with flowers and leaves in shades of blue, green and yellow. For the swivel clasp closure, I used a dark blue cotton webbing. The lining fabric is a green cotton with a white stitch circle pattern which coordinates well with the jacquard ribbon.

The strap is 1.5 inches thick and I made it adjustable so you can wear the bag cross body if you prefer.

This medium sized messenger bag is the perfect size! It has 2 very roomy pockets - one on the outside under the flap and another on the inside of the bag. It has a great extra wide adjustable strap and a trendy swivel clasp closure on the flap.


Measurements are:

Width:11.5 inches (29.21 cm)
Height: 10 inches (25.4 cm)
Depth: 3 inches (7.62 cm)
Strap adjustable from: 25 inches (63.5 cm) to 41.5 inches (105.41 cm)

If you like this bag but would prefer different fabrics, please feel free to convo me. I'd be happy to help!

*** made from a pattern by michellepatterns.com

name: Black denim messenger bag with Jacquard ribbon trim
description:
This bag is made from a black cotton denim with a contrasting blue stitching throughout. On the flap, I've sewn 2 strips of a beautiful floral jacquard ribbon with flowers in 2 shades of blue on a black background. For the swivel clasp closure, I used a black cotton webbing. The lining fabric is an Amy Butler print in shades of blue and green which coordinates well with the jacquard ribbon.

This medium sized messenger bag is the perfect size! It has 2 very roomy pockets - one on the outside under the flap and another on the inside of the bag. It has a great extra wide adjustable strap and a trendy swivel clasp closure on the flap. The strap is 1.5 inches thick and I made it adjustable so you can wear the bag cross body if you prefer.

Measurements are:

Width:11.5 inches (29.21 cm)
Height: 10 inches (25.4 cm)
Depth: 3 inches (7.62 cm)
Strap adjustable from: 24.5 inches (62.23 cm) to 42 inches (106.68 cm)

*** made from a pattern by michellepatterns.com

name: Fruity Chevron with Caramel Brown Canvas Messenger Bag
description:
This medium sized messenger bag is the perfect size! It has 2 very roomy pockets - one on the outside under the flap and another on the inside of the bag. It has a great extra wide adjustable strap and a trendy swivel clasp closure on the flap.

For this messenger bag, I went with a nice summer/fall colour palette. On the flap, I used a canvas with a chevron pattern in orange, lime, fuchsia and red. The body and strap are in a caramel brown canvas with contrasting orange stitching everywhere. The closure is made from a swivel clasp, a nickel O ring and an ivory cotton webbing.

For the lining, I used an ivory cotton/linen blend fabric that is thicker than cotton alone and more durable. I used the chevron canvas for the large slip pocket inside.

The strap is 1.5 inches thick and I made it adjustable so you can wear the bag cross body if you prefer.

Measurements are:

Width:11.5 inches (29.21 cm)
Height: 10 inches (25.4 cm)
Depth: 3 inches (7.62 cm)
Strap adjustable from: 25.5 inches (64.77 cm) to 44 inches (111.76 cm)

*** made from a pattern by michellepatterns.com

name: Yellow Chevron with Grey Canvas Messenger Bag
description:
This medium sized messenger bag is the perfect size! It has 2 very roomy pockets - one on the outside under the flap and another on the inside of the bag. It has a great extra wide adjustable strap and a trendy swivel clasp closure on the flap.

Join the chevron craze with this trendy messenger bag. I used a yellow and white chevron canvas for the flap as well as the inside slip pocket. The body and strap of the bag are in a solid grey cotton canvas that is thick and durable. I also used a coordinating mustard yellow polka dot print for the swivel clasp closure's strap. The lining of the bag is also in the yellow polka dot fabric and I used the chevron print for the slip pocket.

Measurements are:

Width:11.5 inches (29.21 cm)
Height: 10 inches (25.4 cm)
Depth: 3 inches (7.62 cm)
Strap adjustable from: 28.5 inches (72.39 cm) to 49.5 inches (125.73 cm)

If you like this bag but would prefer different fabrics, please feel free to contact me. I'd be happy to help!


*** made from a pattern by michellepatterns.com

name: Coral Billow with Grey Faux Leather Cross Body Bag
description:
This fabulous cross body bag is a small bag that can be worn over one shoulder or cross body and perfect for those who prefer smaller bags.

For this bag, I used a combination of a grey faux leather for the body of the bag and a coral and white billow home decor fabric for the flap.

I used a grey cotton webbing for the flap closure as well as the cross body strap. There is a strip of webbing going down the centre of the flap with a nickel O ring that can then be attached to a nickel swivel clasp that comes from another piece of webbing from the bottom of the bag.

For the lining of the bag, I used a grey cotton duck canvas for the main lining and the coral billow home decor fabric for the slip pocket. The slip pocket inside is big enough for a cell phone, keys and one or two other small items.

*** photo #5 shows the same style of bag in different fabrics for size reference.

Measurements are:
Width at widest: 12 inches (30.48 cm)
Height: 7 inches (17.78 cm)
Depth: 3.5 inches (8.89 cm)
Strap adjustable from: 28 inches (71.12 cm) up to 45 inches (114.3 cm)

name: Blue, Orange and Yellow Hexagons with Navy Blue Denim Cross Body Bag
description:
For this bag, I used a combination of a navy blue denim for the body of the bag and a fabric with a hexagon pattern in blues, oranges and yellow for the flap.

I used a natural ivory cotton webbing for the flap closure as well as the cross body strap. There is a strip of webbing going down the centre of the flap with a nickel O ring that can then be attached to a nickel swivel clasp that comes from another piece of webbing from the bottom of the bag.

For the lining of the bag, I used a turquoise blue feather pattern for the main lining. The zippered pocket and slip pocket lining is in the hexagon fabric. The slip pocket is perfect for smaller items such as keys, phone, cosmetics, etc.

This is a great smaller sized cross body bag with great colours and a unique flap closure and body style.

Measurements are:
Width at widest: 12 inches (30.48 cm)
Height: 7 inches (17.78 cm)
Depth: 3.5 inches (8.89 cm)
Strap adjustable from: 27.5 inches (71.12 cm) up to 44.5 inches (113.03 cm)

*** Photo #5 shows a similar bag for size reference.
